title: Filament Content Component
description: Defines the high-level narrative or belief content of a Filament entity. This is a quantum component.

physics_properties.title: Base Physics Properties
physics_properties.description: Defines the common physics-related properties for components and laws.

collapse_sensitive.description: Indicates if the object is affected by or triggers quantum collapse.

engine.description: The physics engine responsible for this object.

is_quantum.description: Indicates if the object has quantum properties.

narrative_description.title: Description Field
narrative_description.description: A canonical, reusable definition for a human-readable description field.

filament_type.title: Filament Type
filament_type.description: A canonical enum of the types of high-level narratives a Filament can represent.

abstraction_level.title: Abstraction Level
abstraction_level.description: A canonical enum for the level of abstraction of a cognitive entity.

source_threads_and_bonds.title: Source Threads and Bonds Field
source_threads_and_bonds.description: A list of Thread and Bond entity IDs that are the source for a derived cognitive entity like a Filament.

items.title: Entity ID Field
items.description: A reusable definition for a unique entity identifier.
